alert.note: Alert for Barton (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued April 15 at 1:46PM CDT until April 15 at 7:00PM CDT by NWS Springfield
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 230 PM CDT FOR EASTERN BARTON...WESTERN CEDAR AND NORTHERN DADE COUNTIES... At 145 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Lamar, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Ping pong ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Emergency management. Half Dollar size hail reported in Lamar Missouri. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Stockton Lake, Stockton State Park, Stockton, Greenfield, Golden City, Jerico Springs, Arcola, Umber View Heights, Milford, Caplinger Mills, Wagoner, Kenoma, Neola, Cedarville and Sylvania. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.50 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
